post.body: No way, baby... Set up your twitter account to let you text in, and receive texts from people you're following.
It suks when there's a Holiday on a Thursday, 'cuz most of us working saps have to trudge in on Friday to keep the boat afloat.
Back to work on a dreary, rainy Monday. Thank god it's a short week.
I changed my pic for the holidays... Alas, it hasn't updated in the iPhone so yet...
Hey! Teagish is following me now! I think that brings me up to, um... ONE! Woo hoo!
Top 1 reason why Tasi Tsatsakis sucks: He's at ADIM 11 right now hobnobbing with Russ Brown, and I'm not!
**YAWN** Weekly, department-wide "status-update" meetings are the kinds of things I had hoped to avoid when I became a designer...
Updated my twitter desktop design and picture to reflect my logo. Woo-hoo!! it's like myspace Lite!
If more people were following me, I'd tell everyone that Chris and I are having lunch at Kabuki Sushi on Foothill in Pasadena...
Pickin' up some Taco Lita after a looooooong day at work... If there's a better taco in the land, I haven't found it yet!
And now it works on my phone! Schweeeet....
Working my ass of at school... I like Illustrator, but gradient meshes are TOUGH. I much prefer Photoshop!
